hinges.description: Dr. Candy secretly doses Franklin with laudanum
hinges.actual_outcome: Candy slips laudanum into Franklin's drink as petty revenge for being mocked about medicine

hinges.description: Rachel sees Franklin take the diamond
hinges.actual_outcome: Rachel stays silent, assumes Franklin is a thief, breaks off engagement
Rosanna hides the nightgown to protect Franklin, whom she loves

hinges.description: Godfrey takes diamond from unconscious Franklin
hinges.actual_outcome: Godfrey seizes opportunity, takes diamond from Franklin's hand, pawns it to cover debts

hinges.description: Rosanna commits suicide at the Shivering Sand
hinges.actual_outcome: Rosanna drowns herself, leaving letter and nightgown in the quicksand

hinges.description: Dr. Candy falls ill with brain fever
hinges.actual_outcome: Candy's illness prevents him from remembering or revealing what he did
Jennings meticulously documents the fragmentary confessions

hinges.description: Jennings reconstructs the truth from fever-ravings
hinges.actual_outcome: Jennings pieces together that Candy dosed Franklin, proposes experiment

hinges.description: Godfrey observes Franklin with the diamond
hinges.actual_outcome: Godfrey happens to see Franklin wandering with diamond, follows him

hinges.description: Colonel Herncastle leaves diamond to Rachel in his will
hinges.actual_outcome: Herncastle's malicious bequest brings the cursed diamond into the Verinder household
